name: How I met my spaceship
description:
"So you want to know how I met my spaceship? It's a great story, about a fair game of cards where no one and under no circumstance cheated."

How I met my spaceship is a graphic adventure set in a remote planet where you are telling the story of how you won your spaceship in a totally fair game of cards.

Controls:

WASD + mouse to move in first person

Space to jump

E to interact or talk

This game was made in a week for the Mayor Jam 4. 

Credits:

Alejandro Pinel Martínez & Miguel Pinel Martínez

All assets used have been created by us, are free to use or we have purchased the right to use them.
